pages.text: Cosmo's can only be hurt if they are attacked with any type of stone block. Cosmo's come in 7 differrent variants; red, green, blue, yellow, pink, purple and alpha. The alpha variant has a 1 in 250 chance of spawning and will do more damage, inflict blindness and randomly teleport you on hit$(br2)Each Cosmo variant drops their corresponding coloured spine on death
Cosmo's are found in a Comatose within the Illusion biome
